products.title: Sodium Sulphite Anhydrous
products.fulldescription: Sodium sulphite anhydrous (Na₂SO₃) is a white powder used as a reducing agent in chemical industries. It prevents oxidation in water treatment, textiles, and photography. It acts as a preservative by inhibiting bacterial growth. In pulp and paper industries, it plays a role in delignification. Exposure can irritate the skin and eyes, so handling with protection is advised. It must be stored in dry, well-sealed containers away from moisture.
products.description: Sodium Sulphite Anhydrous by DCI. Weight: 1.5 kg, Dimensions: 18 x 11 x 7 cm. Rated 3.0★ (34 reviews). Standard shipping: $7.95. Care: Store in a dry, cool place.

details.care_info: Store in a dry, cool place

products.title: Sodium Metabisulphite
products.fulldescription: Sodium metabisulfite (Na₂S₂O₅) is a white, crystalline powder commonly used as a disinfectant, antioxidant, and preservative. It releases sulfur dioxide (SO₂) when dissolved in water, which inhibits microbial growth and oxidation. It's widely used in the food industry (E223) to preserve color and shelf life of dried fruits, wines, and juices. In pharmaceuticals and cosmetics, it prevents spoilage and maintains product stability. It is also used in water treatment, photography, and textile bleaching. However, it can cause allergic reactions or respiratory irritation in sensitive individuals.
products.description: Sodium Metabisulphite by DCI. Weight: 1.0 kg, Dimensions: 19 x 6 x 6 cm. Rated 3.6★ (16 reviews). Standard shipping: $7.95. Care: Store in a dry, cool place.

details.care_info: Store in a dry, cool place

products.title: Sodium Bisulphite
products.fulldescription: Sodium bisulfite (NaHSO₃) is a reducing agent used in dechlorination, bleaching, and preservation. It neutralizes chlorine in water treatment systems and serves as a preservative in food and beverages. It releases SO₂ gas under acidic conditions, aiding in microbial inhibition. Sodium bisulfite is also used in leather processing and pharmaceutical formulation. Irritating to eyes and respiratory tract; handle in ventilated areas. Store in sealed containers to avoid moisture absorption.
products.description: Sodium Bisulphite by DCI. Weight: 3.0 kg, Dimensions: 18 x 6 x 3 cm. Rated 4.6★ (34 reviews). Standard shipping: $7.95. Care: Store in a dry, cool place.

details.care_info: Store in a dry, cool place

products.title: Potassium Metabisulphite
products.fulldescription: Potassium metabisulfite (K₂S₂O₅) is commonly used in winemaking and brewing to sterilize equipment and prevent spoilage. It acts as an antioxidant and antimicrobial agent, preserving color and flavor. It also inhibits wild yeast growth. Used in food as E224, it's effective at controlling oxidation. Potassium metabisulfite is favored for its lower sodium content. It decomposes to release SO₂ gas when dissolved, which acts as a sanitizer. Proper PPE is needed due to potential respiratory irritation.
products.description: Potassium Metabisulphite by DCI. Weight: 1.9 kg, Dimensions: 15 x 15 x 6 cm. Rated 3.7★ (47 reviews). Standard shipping: $7.95. Care: Store in a dry, cool place.

details.care_info: Store in a dry, cool place

products.title: Sodium Hypochloride
products.fulldescription: Sodium hypochlorite (NaOCl) is a pale greenish-yellow solution with strong disinfectant properties. It is the active ingredient in household bleach and is used for sanitation in water treatment. In healthcare, it's used for surface sterilization and endodontics. It is also widely used in laundry and sanitation industries. Highly effective against bacteria, viruses, and fungi. It must be handled carefully, as it’s corrosive to skin and mucous membranes. Store in a cool, well-ventilated place away from acids.
products.description: Sodium Hypochloride by DCI. Weight: 4.7 kg, Dimensions: 12 x 7 x 4 cm. Rated 5.0★ (16 reviews). Standard shipping: $7.95. Care: Store in a dry, cool place.

details.care_info: Store in a dry, cool place
